typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		USUARIO as string,
		F_ACTUAL as string,
		PROGRAMA as string,
		COD_CLI as string,
		APE1_CLI as string,
		APE2_CLI as string,
		NOM_CLI as string,
		TFNO_CLI as string,
		COD_CALLE as string,
		NUM_PUERTA as string,
		DUPLICADOR as string,
		CGV_CLI as string,
		DOC_ID as string,
		TIP_DOC as string,
		CO_PAIS as string,
		TIP_CLI as string,
		F_ALTA as string,
		F_BAJA as string,
		NRH as string,
		NRH_FAV as string,
		NRH_PEN as string,
		FAX_CLI as string,
		PERS_CONTACTO as string,
		CO_COND_FISCAL as string,
		SOUNDEX_AP1 as string,
		SOUNDEX_AP2 as string,
		REF_DIR as string,
		CUALIF_CLI as string,
		NUM_DEV_CHEQ as string,
		CANT_LETRAS_IMPAGAS as string,
		NUM_FISCAL as string,
		APE1_CLI_UP as string,
		DATOS as string,
		COD_POST as string,
		NIF as string,
		TFNO2_CLI as string,
		DATOS2 as string,
		EST_CLI as string,
		SPEC_SIGNAL as string,
		APE3_CLI as string,
		APE1_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE2_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE3_CLI_ARAB as string,
		NOM_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE1_CLI_ARAB_UP as string,
		IND_CASH_ONLY as string,
		COD_RATING as string,
		F_RATING as string,
		PASSPORT_NO as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		NIF_WORK as string,
		F_BIRTH as string,
		TFNO3_CLI as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		OBSERVACIONES as string,
		PASSWORD as string,
		F_CASH_ONLY as string,
		EMAIL2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DataFlowCount
DataFlowCount aggregate(groupBy(PASSWORD),
	PASSWORD = count(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		USUARIO as string,
		F_ACTUAL as string,
		PROGRAMA as string,
		COD_CLI as string,
		APE1_CLI as string,
		APE2_CLI as string,
		NOM_CLI as string,
		TFNO_CLI as string,
		COD_CALLE as string,
		NUM_PUERTA as string,
		DUPLICADOR as string,
		CGV_CLI as string,
		DOC_ID as string,
		TIP_DOC as string,
		CO_PAIS as string,
		TIP_CLI as string,
		F_ALTA as string,
		F_BAJA as string,
		NRH as string,
		NRH_FAV as string,
		NRH_PEN as string,
		FAX_CLI as string,
		PERS_CONTACTO as string,
		CO_COND_FISCAL as string,
		SOUNDEX_AP1 as string,
		SOUNDEX_AP2 as string,
		REF_DIR as string,
		CUALIF_CLI as string,
		NUM_DEV_CHEQ as string,
		CANT_LETRAS_IMPAGAS as string,
		NUM_FISCAL as string,
		APE1_CLI_UP as string,
		DATOS as string,
		COD_POST as string,
		NIF as string,
		TFNO2_CLI as string,
		DATOS2 as string,
		EST_CLI as string,
		SPEC_SIGNAL as string,
		APE3_CLI as string,
		APE1_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE2_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE3_CLI_ARAB as string,
		NOM_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE1_CLI_ARAB_UP as string,
		IND_CASH_ONLY as string,
		COD_RATING as string,
		F_RATING as string,
		PASSPORT_NO as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		NIF_WORK as string,
		F_BIRTH as string,
		TFNO3_CLI as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		OBSERVACIONES as string,
		PASSWORD as string,
		F_CASH_ONLY as string,
		EMAIL2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NewCount'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
